Welcome to Manim Physics’s documentation!¶

manim-physics is a 2D physics simulation manim plugin that allows you to generate complicated scenes in various branches of Physics such as rigid mechanics, electromagnetism, wave etc.

Contributors:

  • pdcxs

  • Matheart

  • icedcoffeeee
